tasks.task: Tour of an onion farm and apple orchard
subtasks: Welcome message
Information about onion production in the US
Describe onion harvesting machinery
Detail onion cleaning and sorting processes
Explain manual harvesting of onions
Describe onion transportation and storage
Discuss the science behind growing onions
Outline the process of apple tree grafting
Detail soil preparation for apple orchards
Explain the planting and care of apple grafts
Describe the apple blooming and pollination process
Explain manual apple harvesting
Describe the use of automated apple harvesters
Detail apple cleaning and sorting processes
Explain apple juice production
Describe freeze-drying of apple slices
Highlight the importance of each process in the crops' journey
